name: AVSampleCursorChunkInfo
desc: A value that provides information about a chunk of media samples.

items.name: var chunkSampleCount: Int64
items.desc: The count of media samples in the chunk.

items.name: var chunkHasUniformSampleSizes: ObjCBool
items.desc: The samples in the chunk occupy the same number of bytes in storage.

items.name: var chunkHasUniformSampleDurations: ObjCBool
items.desc: The samples in the chunk have the same duration.

items.name: var chunkHasUniformFormatDescriptions: ObjCBool
items.desc: The samples in the chunk have the same format description.

items.name: init(chunkSampleCount: Int64, chunkHasUniformSampleSizes: ObjCBool, chunkHasUniformSampleDurations: ObjCBool, chunkHasUniformFormatDescriptions: ObjCBool)
items.desc: Creates a chunk information structure with the specified values.
